html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-08872019-06-21,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Nicaragua) Regulations
PrecisSPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (NICARAGUA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) put pressure on the Government of Nicaragua to change its behaviour; (2) communicate a clear message to the Government of Nicaragua that Canada will not accept that gross and systematic human rights violations continue to take place at the hands of the State with impunity; and (3) encourage progress with the negotiation process.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Special Economic Measures (Nicaragua) Regulations
precis: SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (NICARAGUA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) put pressure on the Government of Nicaragua to change its behaviour; (2) communicate a clear message to the Government of Nicaragua that Canada will not accept that gross and systematic human rights violations continue to take place at the hands of the State with impunity; and (3) encourage progress with the negotiation process.
